meanings.definition: An ornamental arrangement of flower beds in a garden.
meanings.sent1: The colorful parterres in the garden brightened up the whole yard.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the intricate parterres filled with blooming flowers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the parterres, pretending to be a gardener.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like the flowers in the parterres, spreading beauty all around.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the parterres lingered in the air, a sweet reminder of nature's artistry.

meanings.definition: A section of a theater or concert hall where seats are divided into separate areas.
meanings.sent1: The front parterres of the theater offered a close view of the stage.
meanings.sent2: Audience members in the parterres enjoyed a more intimate theater experience.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actors interacted with the audience in the parterres, adding a fun twist to the performance.
meanings.sent4: The parterres of the concert hall resembled a mosaic of seating arrangements, creating a unique atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: From the parterres, the music sounded like a gentle breeze, surrounding listeners with its melodies.
